text: the other ambulance crew came back and then saw me outside and they were in shock
and i told them the situation of what happened  and i went inside
the other ambulance crew A122 (im A123) abt 10min later went for call
no lah dei i paid for it alr
and then i went to sleep (got nothing better to do)
then all of a sudden A123 got call  i woke up and saw the FP void of people
i checked outside to see if A123 was outside but it wasn't  so i realised they didn't even return to base and they got called
AND THE STORY DOESN'T END THERE

30min later  i see my snr medic call me like 2 times to ask me to collect his food  but me being the idiot i am went outside and closed the door  only to realise i didn't have key and the door auto locks
so once i went out and took the food and returned
when i went to SGH to send patient  A122 sent another patient at ard same time  turns out he was a cbt medic
if only we took that call sia
how can i compete with the great bedok
ehhh ive been counting down since more than 400 days ago
